title: John Mannion Homework 2 - USArrests
contents:
[1] 50  4

I will be using the USArrests dataset, which comes preloaded in R.
The dataset has 50 rows, one for each state, and 4 columns listing the rater of murder, assault, and rape per 100,000 residents, as well as the percent of the state that lives in an urban environment (UrbanPop) in 1973.
I will attempt to answer the question, “does the percentage of urban residents in a state increase crime?”
